attributes.action: ban all puppy farms in the uk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the cruelty to these poor animals is beyond belief.the puppy farms in wales are the worst but all farms must be closed for these animals health and well being.please check out sites eg. many tears.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
